mapper.select: SELECT A.ROW_NUM, A.FREE_BOARD_NO, A.WRITER, A.CONTENT, A.IP, A.CREATED, A.STATE, A.DEPTH, A.GROUP_NO, A.GROUP_ORD FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY GROUP_NO DESC, GROUP_ORD) AS ROW_NUM, FREE_BOARD_NO, WRITER, CONTENT, IP, CREATED, STATE, DEPTH, GROUP_NO, GROUP_ORD FROM FREE_BOARD) A WHERE A.ROW_NUM BETWEEN #{beginRecord} AND #{endRecord}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FREE_BOARD (FREE_BOARD_NO, WRITER, CONTENT, IP, CREATED, STATE, DEPTH, GROUP_NO, GROUP_ORD) VALUES (FREE_BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{writer}, #{content}, #{ip}, SYSDATE, 1, 0, FREE_BOARD_SEQ.CURRVAL, 0)

INSERT INTO FREE_BOARD (FREE_BOARD_NO, WRITER, CONTENT, IP, CREATED, STATE, DEPTH, GROUP_NO, GROUP_ORD) VALUES (FREE_BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{writer}, #{content}, #{ip}, SYSDATE, 1, #{depth}, #{groupNo}, #{groupOrd})
